{{ja-kanjitab|へん|たい|か|k3=が|な|r=y}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=へんたいがな|変体|tr1=hentai|t1=variant form|仮名|tr2=kana|t2=the hiragana or katakana syllabaries; a syllabary character}}.  {{rendaku2|sort=へんたいがな|kana|gana}}

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|へんたいがな|acc=h|acc2=3|acc_ref=NHK,DJR,SMK5|acc2_ref=NHK,DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|へんたいがな|kyu=變體假名}}

# [[hentaigana]]: a [[variant]] [[form]] of a [[hiragana]] or [[katakana]] character, often from an alternate {{m|ja|万葉仮名|tr=man'yōgana}}

====See also====
* {{ja-r|万葉仮名|まんようがな}}: ''Man'yō'' characters, the ancestors of modern ''kana'' as derived from cursive forms of [[kanji]] used [[phonetically]] in the ''{{w|Man'yōshū}}'' collection of poetry
